evidence.text: Person B: Bruh, he’s just playin’! He didn’t die. But he did fuck my girlfriend.

Person A: He passed away.
Person B: Bruh, he’s just playin’! He didn’t die. But he did fuck my girlfriend.

Person A: Stoked you could make it! Lets stack some clips, dawwwg.
Person B: ...You kinda look like a pervert when you hold the camera like that.
Person B: Chris, you get me jukin’ that guy?!
Person B: Nahhh, okay! Do your thing, do your thing. I think we gotta submit something soon, but I respect the craft. Good shit, Chris. Really glad that you’re here.

Person B: Wait, bruh! If we’re gonna watch clips then we need snacks. You got any snacks?
Person B: Damn...no snacks? Can I have some of these?
